title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: The StyledText component in the software is experiencing inefficient redraw during text changes when word wrap is enabled.
EB: The redraw process during text changes with word wrap should be more efficient, avoiding unnecessary redraws and optimizing the rendering performance.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Enable word wrap in the StyledText component.
2. Perform a text change operation.
3. Observe the inefficient redraws occurring.

Additional debug information can be added to the code by inserting the following line in the 'performPaint' method of the StyledText component: 'System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);'
